TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1018
TEI.2.document_title: Washington Hotel to Stephen F Austin, 12-10-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Washington Hotel, Mexico, December 9, 1833. Bill.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1018

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Washington Hotel, Mexico, December 9, 1833. Bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833 */date_mentioned* To Washington Hotel Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-1-1833">Novr. 1 */date_mentioned* To 1 Bot wine___________________________________________ $1. 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-16-1833">16 */date_mentioned* " cash lent____________________________________________ 3,—*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-16-1833">"*/date_mentioned* " 1 Bot wine___________________________________________ 1. 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-16-1833">" */date_mentioned* " l Glass tody_______________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-20-1833">20*/date_mentioned* " 2 Glasses Whiskey____________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-22-1833">22*/date_mentioned* " "Glasses______________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-23-1833">23*/date_mentioned* — 2 Glass brandy______________________________________ 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-23-1833">"*/date_mentioned* — cash lent____________________________________________ 2.—*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-24-1833">24*/date_mentioned* — 2 Glasses_____________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-25-1833">25*/date_mentioned* —2 do_________________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-25-1833">" */date_mentioned* — cash lent_______________________________ 2. 0*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-27-1833">27*/date_mentioned* " 3 Glasses___________________________________________ 3*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-27-1833">"*/date_mentioned* " 1 Glass tody________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-27-1833">"*/date_mentioned* " 2 Glass spts______________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-29-1833">29*/date_mentioned* — 2 do do____________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-30-1833">30*/date_mentioned* — 1 Glass Ale___________________________________________ 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-01-1833">Decr 1*/date_mentioned* " 1 Brandy Sling________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-02-1833">2 */date_mentioned* " 1 Glass brandy________________________________________ 1*/p*
*p* - — 2 Glasses do________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-04-1833">4 */date_mentioned* — 2 do do___________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-05-1833">5*/date_mentioned* — 1 Glass brandy____________________________________ 1*/p*
*p*1 Bot Ale_________________________________________ 3*/p*
*p*2 Glass____________________________________________ 2*/p*
*p*Keeping one horse 2d inst__________________________ 0. 4*/p*
*p*do do 2 horses from *date_mentioned n="12-03-1833">3d*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="12-05-1833">5th*/date_mentioned* inclusive is 3 days___ $1—3*/p*
*p*Stable room for 2 Horses from *date_mentioned n="12-06-1833">6th*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="12-09-1833">9th*/date_mentioned* inclusive 4 days 1/each beast per day__________________ 1*/p*
*p*$18. 2*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-09-1833">Dec 9 */date_mentioned* To Mule from *date_mentioned n="12-08-1833">8th*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="12-09-1833">9th*/date_mentioned* inclusive 2 days_________________ 0. 2*/p*
*p*" Board from*date_mentioned n="11-01-1833"> Nov 1st*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="12-09-1833">Decr 9th*/date_mentioned* inclusive is 5 days $9___ 50. 1 1/4*/p*
*p*" Room rent for Same time 39 days 6 1/2 Rs_______________ 31 5 1/2*/p*
*p*$100. 2 3/4*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="12-10-1833">Dec 10*/date_mentioned* To l Bf_______________________________ 4*/p*
*p*Mo. *date_mentioned n="12-10-1833">Dec 10 1833*/date_mentioned*_________________________________________ $100. 6 3/4*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W J Offutt y co*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*pr *person_mentioned*J Ripley*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Endorsement by Austin:]*/p*
*p*Paid by a note favor of *person_mentioned*Ithaman Whiting*/person_mentioned* payable to *person_mentioned*J. W. Breedlove*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*N. Orleans*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-01-1834">April 1 next*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
